tbs.view
Class TBSView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              tbs.view.TBSView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class TBSView
extends javax.swing.JComponent

TBSView contains the logic for rendering the information contained in the data model.

See Also:
Serialized Form
